Title: The Baby
Plot: Stacey travels to Essex and back into the arms of Gavin. Everything seems perfect until Pam and Mick offer to cover the down payment on a house for Gavin and Stacey. Stacey tells Gavin that it can?t work between them because they both need to live in their own towns. If they were truly meant to be together, this wouldn?t matter, they would even think about it?but that clearly isn?t the case. She gives him her wedding ring back...
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
